function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reliance on AI-based technologies for early detection and monitoring","Impact":"Unreliable detection or false alerts leading to missed cases or unnecessary isolation","Mitigation":"Regular calibration and validation of AI systems, combined with manual verification for accuracy","Technologies":"AI-based temperature detection, smartwatches, biometric wristbands","People":"General public, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Health authorities, technology developers"},{"Description":"Privacy concerns and ethical implications of mass surveillance","Impact":"Invasion of privacy, potential misuse of personal data, and violation of civil liberties","Mitigation":"Strict data protection regulations, transparent use of data, and informed consent for monitoring","Technologies":"Drones, facial recognition systems, CCTV","People":"General public, individuals in monitored areas","Owner":"Government, regulatory bodies, technology developers"},{"Description":"Dependence on technology for social distancing enforcement","Impact":"Over-reliance on technology leading to negligence of personal responsibility and potential resistance from the public","Mitigation":"Balancing technology with public education and empowerment, creating incentives for compliance","Technologies":"Self-driving robots, drones, AI-enabled systems","People":"General public, law enforcement agencies","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"}]}
